locale.name: uk_UA
locale.message: Модуль публікацій у XML
Імпорт та експорт публікацій

Використання: {$scriptName} {$pluginName} [команда] ... Команди: import [xmlFileName] [journal_path] [user_name] ... export [xmlFileName] [journal_path] articles [articleId1] [articleId2] ... export [xmlFileName] [journal_path] article [articleId] export [xmlFileName] [journal_path] issues [issueId1] [issueId2] ... export [xmlFileName] [journal_path] issue [issueId]
Для того, щоб дані були імпортовані належним чином, залежно від кореневого вузла документу XML, необхідно вказувати додаткові параметри.
Якщо кореневим вузлом є <article> або <articles>, необхідно вказувати додаткові параметри. Дозволеними є наступні формати:
{$scriptName} {$pluginName} import [xmlFileName] [journal_path] [user_name] issue_id [issueId] section_id [sectionId]
{$scriptName} {$pluginName} import [xmlFileName] [journal_path] [user_name] issue_id [issueId] section_name [name]
{$scriptName} {$pluginName} import [xmlFileName] [journal_path] issue_id [issueId] section_abbrev [abbrev]
Експорт даних
Export Tracks
Export Papers
Select Paper
Import Papers

The file you are importing contains one or more papers. You must choose a track to import these papers into; if you do not wish to import them all into the same track, you may either separate them into different XML files or move them into the appropriate tracks after importing.
Імпорт даних
Цей модуль дозволяє імпортування даних з файлів, які відповідають визначенню типу документа native.dtd. У модулі наявна підтримка кореневих вузлів <article>, <articles>, <issue>, та <issues>.
Помилка імпортування

У процесі імпортування виникла принаймні одна помилка. Будь ласка, перевірте, щоб формат імпортованого файлу повністю відповідав специфікації. Помилки імпортування, які мали місце, деталізуються нижче.
ПОМИЛКА:
Вивантаження невдале; будь ласка, переконайтеся, що вивантаження дозволене на вашому сервері і файл не є завеликим згідно вашої конфігурації PHP та веб-серверу.
Визначений користувач ("{$userName}") не існує.
The specified conference or scheduled conference path, "{$conferencePath}" or "{$schedConfPath}" (respectively), does not exist.
Не вдається запис до файлу "{$fileName}".
No track matched the specifier "{$trackIdentifier}".
No paper matched the specified paper ID "{$paperId}".
Цей модуль не має підтримки кореневого вузла "{$rootName}". Будь ласка, додатково перевірте коректність файлу і спробуйте знову.
Некоректне значення булевого атрибуту ("{$value}"). Будь ласка, використовуйте "true" або "false".
Визначена некоректна дата "{$value}".
Дані були вбудовані з використанням невідомого типу кодування "{$type}".
Неможливо зберігти локальну копію "{$originalName}".
Визначена адреса URL "{$url}" для випуску "{$issueTitle}" некоректна. Веб-орієнтоване імпортування підтримує лише методи http, https, ftp або ftps.
Визначений невідомий тип супровідного файлу ("{$suppFileType}").
Вказана адреса URL "{$url}" не може бути скопійована до локального файлу.
A paper title ("{$paperTitle}") was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A paper abstract was provided for the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
Стаття "{$articleTitle}" у розділі "{$sectionTitle}" випуску "{$issueTitle}" не має мітки гранки.
Стаття "{$articleTitle}" у розділі "{$sectionTitle}" випуску "{$issueTitle}" не має супровідного файлу.
Стаття "{$articleTitle}" у розділі "{$sectionTitle}" випуску "{$issueTitle}" не має файлу гранки.
A track title ("{$trackTitle}") was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A track abbreviation ("{$trackAbbrev}") was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A track identifying type ("{$trackIdentifyType}") was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A track policy ("{$trackPolicy}") was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
The track title "{$track1Title}" and the track title "{$track2Title}" matched the different existing conference tracks.
The track title "{$trackTitle}" matched an existing conference track, but another title of this track doesn't match with another title of the existing conference track.
The track abbreviation "{$track1Abbrev}" and the track abbreviation "{$track2Abbrev}" matched the different existing conference tracks.
The track abbreviation "{$trackAbbrev}" matched an existing conference track, but another abbreviation of this track doesn't match with another abbreviation of the existing conference track.
A paper discipline was provided for the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A paper type was provided for the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A paper subject was provided for the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A paper subject classification was provided for the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A paper geographical coverage was provided for the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A paper chronological coverage was provided for the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A paper sample coverage was provided for the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A paper sponsor was provided for the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A author competing interest was provided for the author "{$authorFullName}" of the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A author biography was provided for the author "{$authorFullName}" of the paper "{$paperTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
Гранка статті "{$articleTitle}" у випуску "{$issueTitle}" представлена у локалізації "{$locale}", що не підтримується цим журналом.
A supplementary file title ("{$suppFileTitle}") of the paper "{$paperTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A creator of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the paper "{$paperTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A subject of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the paper "{$paperTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A custom type of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the paper "{$paperTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A description of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the paper "{$paperTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A publisher of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the paper "{$paperTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A sponsor of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the paper "{$paperTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
A source of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the paper "{$paperTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this conference does not support.
Імпорт успішний
Імпорт успішний. Успішно імпортовані обёєкти вказані нижче.
